title: Peano-Gosper Fractal
description: An interactive MicroSim demonstrating the Peano-Gosper curve (Gosper curve or flowsnake) with adjustable recursion depth and size controls.
creator: Dan McCreary
subject: Mathematics
Geometry
Fractals
L-Systems
learningObjectives: Understand how L-systems generate complex fractals from simple rules
Explore the relationship between recursion and visual complexity
Recognize hexagonal symmetry in mathematical patterns
Understand the concept of space-filling curves

controls.name: recursionSlider
controls.label: Recursion Level
controls.description: Controls the depth of L-system iterations. Higher values create more detailed, space-filling patterns.

controls.name: sizeSlider
controls.label: Size
controls.description: Adjusts the overall size of the curve within the canvas.
